.. _`design_system_components_password`:

Password
========

.. figure:: images/component_password.png
   :align: center


Description
-----------

Text input component that can be used to enter a password. The user input will be masked by default.


API Documentation
-----------------

:ref:`cs-web-components-base-formcontrols.Password.__module__`


Related Components
------------------

:ref:`design_system_components_form`
